Headline: Temporary Southbound #34 South Michigan Reroute near 131st Langley
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted near 131st Langley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 133rd Place, 134th Street, Indiana, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 131st Langley.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Chicago
ShortDescription: 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Chicago, Halsted & Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Chicago, Halsted & Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Chicago.

Allow extra travel time.
